refnamediv.refpurpose: Inspect, modify and configure disks and block devices

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: gnome-disks is the disk utility in GNOME. It provides a way to inspect, format, partition and configure disks and block devices.

refsect1.title: AUTHOR
refsect1.para: Written by David Zeuthen zeuthen@gmail.com with a lot of help from many others.
